task.title: Configuring the Kafka Consumer
task.shortdesc: When you configure the Kafka Consumer, you configure the general properties, including Kafka and ZooKeeper details. You can optionally add custom advanced properties. And after you select the type of data to be processed, you can configure related properties for that type.

context.p:
The Kafka Consumer properties display in the following tabs in the Properties panel:
General. Kafka configuration details, batch information, and payload type.
Advanced. Custom Kafka properties that you want to use.
Log. currently, no tab for this - no extra properties?
JSON. JSON properties for JSON paylods.
CSV. CSV properties for CSV payloads.
